notes.address_profile: EXPANDED: Captures ALL participants with tx counts, gas spent, ETH/ERC20 flows, call targets, and temporal bounds
notes.state_proof: Balance snapshots at checkpoint blocks enable before/after state reconstruction
notes.internal_transfers: Extracted from callTracer; any call with value > 0 emitted as internal_native_transfer
notes.block_ordering: Block transaction ordering from receipt.transactionIndex enables MEV/sandwich detection
notes.revert_decoding: Improved: decodes Error(string), Panic(uint256), and trace revertReason fields
notes.allowance_usage: IMPROVED: Links Approval events to transferFrom calls for abuse detection; now catches more matching patterns
notes.mempool_capture: SIM-ONLY via eth_pendingTransactions; optional and may be empty on Anvil
notes.governance_tracking: Storage snapshots available in RAW/state; governance folder files intentionally empty - see explanation below

empty_files_explanation.token_balance_deltas: Tracked via asset_transfers (ERC20 Transfer events). Raw snapshots in RAW/state/token_balance_snapshots; to compute deltas, compare snapshots before/after key transactions. Asset flow analysis covers 90% of use cases.
empty_files_explanation.admin_changes_critical_slot_deltas: Require comparing storage state before/after block execution. Raw snapshots available in RAW/state/storage_snapshots. Anvil limitation: prestateTracer only provides pre-state. Full implementation requires Geth/Erigon state diffs. Manual comparison possible using storage_snapshots data.
empty_files_explanation.revert_reasons: Only emitted for reverted transactions. Empty if simulation has mostly successful txs (common in synthetic scenarios).
empty_files_explanation.mempool_pending: SIM-ONLY. May be empty on Anvil during normal mining. NOT available on real chains (mempool is ephemeral, not queryable historically).

notes.schema_version: See META/schema_version.json for full doc_type registry
